name: Enchanted Forest
longDesc: Large trees with hanging moss as far as the eye can see dominate the landscape, after a recent rain, petrichor fills his nose. He looks around and notices branches that have fallen are scattered about. To his left, a trail heads deeper into the forest. There are large boulders next to the river. There is movement between the boulders.
shortDesc: There are branches on the ground and large boulders next to the river. To the left, a trail heads deeper into the forest.
